None.Name: Root
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Explosive Spores, Linked Fire, Siege

None.Name: Explosive Spores
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit fires off a giant spore that deals 150 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 225 in total. Has a long range of 50m. Knocks back small and medium untis. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 5 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks.

en.Description:
Lifepoints +360
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +690
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +750
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

de.Description:
Lifepoints +360
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +690
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +750
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

ru.Description:
Lifepoints +360
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +690
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +750
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Extra.en: Each unit (buildings do not count) in the Root Network increases the amount of projectiles of the Explosive Spores attack,  increasing its damage by roughly 420,  up to a maximum of 6 additional units at U3.
Extra.de: Each unit (buildings do not count) in the Root Network increases the amount of projectiles of the Explosive Spores attack,  increasing its damage by roughly 420,  up to a maximum of 6 additional units at U3.
Extra.ru: Each unit (buildings do not count) in the Root Network increases the amount of projectiles of the Explosive Spores attack,  increasing its damage by roughly 420,  up to a maximum of 6 additional units at U3.
